original_title:
Secretary Sean Duffy
:
This cannot happen again.

.
@FMCSA
 is launching an investigation into both the driver and White Hawk Carrier.  — The Donald
article_summary: Secretary Duffy launches an investigation into a trucking accident involving an illegal immigrant driver, with calls for stricter regulations and potential suspension of the company's DOT registration. Debate ensues over the need for federal control of commercial driver's licenses and drug testing policies.</s>
